changePlan.question: Can I change plans at any time?
changePlan.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade at any time from your admin dashboard in the "Billing" section. Changes take effect immediately and the difference is prorated based on your billing period.

hiddenFees.question: Are there any hidden fees?
hiddenFees.answer: No hidden fees. The price shown is the price you pay. Transaction fees for your members' card payments are standard (1.4% + â‚¬0.25 per successful transaction via Stripe).

freeTrial.question: How does the free trial work?
freeTrial.answer: You get a full 14-day trial on Community Plus and Community Pro plans, no credit card required. At the end of the trial, you can choose to subscribe or continue with the free plan (limited to 50 members).

memberLimit.question: What happens if I exceed my member limit?
memberLimit.answer: If you're approaching your member limit, you'll receive a notification. Once the limit is reached, you won't be able to add new members until you upgrade your plan or free up slots.

federation.question: Do you offer pricing for large federations?
federation.answer: Yes, the Enterprise plan is designed for large organizations with specific needs. Contact our sales team for a custom offer including multi-site deployment, custom integrations, and dedicated support.

resetPassword.question: How do I reset my password?
resetPassword.answer: You can reset your password from the login screen by clicking 'Forgot password'.

memberCard.question: Where can I find my membership card?
memberCard.answer: Your membership card is accessible from the 'Card' tab in the mobile app.

scanQr.question: How do I scan a QR code at an event?
scanQr.answer: Use the Admin Mobile app and go to the 'Scanner' section to validate entries.

multipleCommunities.question: Can I manage multiple communities?
multipleCommunities.answer: Yes, you can switch between your different communities from the 'Community Hub'.

isFree.question: Is Koomy free?
isFree.answer: We offer a free plan for small communities (under 100 members). For larger needs, our paid plans offer advanced features. Check our Pricing page for details.
